name: To Rei (Prototype)
description:
To Rei is a fan interactive novel for My Hero Academia (僕のヒーローアカデミア) by Kōhei Horikoshi as a Mother's Day tribute.

Note that a number of game visuals including character sprites were not finished in time. If there is ever a future update, they will be added.

Nearly 5000 words long. One play-through should take about 15 to 30 min.

Relevant Warnings:

⚠️ Mentions of real world event (COVID-19 pandemic)
⚠️ Mentions of canon typical domestic abuse
⚠️ Quirks are easy plot devices
⚠️ The author of this game hasn't been reading the manga properly
